title: Matte Velvet Lipstick
shortDescription: Long-lasting matte lipstick with a smooth finish.
fullDescription: This Matte Velvet Lipstick delivers intense pigmentation with a comfortable matte formula that lasts all day. Perfect for daily wear or special occasions.

title: Hydrating Skincare Serum
shortDescription: Lightweight serum for glowing, hydrated skin.
fullDescription: A deeply hydrating face serum enriched with hyaluronic acid to lock in moisture, brighten skin tone, and reduce dullness over time.

title: Trendy Round Glasses

title: White Sneakers
fullDescription: These minimalist white sneakers are perfect for everyday use. Durable, comfortable, and easy to style with any outfit.

title: Gentle Face Wash
shortDescription: Foaming face wash for clean, soft skin.
